games.summary: DALLAS -- —Klay Thompsonscored all 23 of his points in the first half, including the 17,000th of his career, and six Mavericks scored in double figures in a 138-120 win over Utah on Saturday night as Dallas completed a two-game sweep of the Jazz. games.summary: DETROIT -- —Duncan RobinsonandCade Cunninghameach scored 16 points in limited minutes as theDetroit Pistonsrouted the shorthandedIndiana Pacers121-78 on Saturday night at Little Caesars Arena. Jarace Walkerled Indiana with 13 points andTony Bradleyadded 12.

games.summary: NEW YORK -- —Devin Bookerscored 27 points after missing a game with a sprained left ankle, and thePhoenix Sunsbeat the slumpingNew York Knicks106-99 on Saturday night. Karl-Anthony Townsand Deuce McBride each scored 23 points for the Knicks, who were playing without startersJalen BrunsonandJosh Hartbecause of ankle injuries.
blurbs: 📋 Mohamed Diawara (NY) made just his 5th start this season. 3 pts, 4 reb.

games.summary: SAN FRANCISCO -- — De’Anthony Melton scored 24 points as Golden State had eight players reach double figures in the Warriors’ 136-116 victory over theCharlotte Hornetson Saturday night. Draymond Greenscored 20 points for the Warriors, who got 16 fromBrandin Podziemskiand 14 apiece fromStephen CurryandBuddy Hield.
